definition: destitute of blood or apparently so
details:
adjective
- destitute of blood or apparently so
= example: destitute of blood or apparently so
= synonyms: exsanguine, exsanguinous
- free from blood or bloodshed
= example: free from blood or bloodshed
- anemic looking from illness or emotion
= synonyms: livid, white, ashen, blanched
- devoid of human emotion or feeling
= example: devoid of human emotion or feeling
- without vigor or zest or energy
= example: without vigor or zest or energy
